name: Joined Cats
description:
--- Description ---

In this game you control two cats - Dela and Maciek. Dela likes to eat fish, and Maciek prefers canned cat food. Collect them all to go to complete the game!

--- Controls ---

Dela - A, D

Maciek - J, L

R to restart the level

Good luck!

~Toast Cat Games, Anks & Novaq
